list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: explain the meaning of (information, words, or actions).
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the evidence is difficult to interpret
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Bằng chứng rất khó diễn giải

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: translate orally or into sign language the words of a person speaking a different language.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: I agreed to interpret for Jean-Claude
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tôi đồng ý giải thích cho Jean-Claude
